This is a modifier. Returns a list of webcams according to the listed continents. Multiple continents must be separated by comma. Required: at least one {continent}.

required_parameters.name: continent
required_parameters.description: Possible values for {continent} are: "AF" (Africa), "AN" (Antarctica), "AS" (Asia), "EU" (Europe), "NA" (North America), "OC" (Oceania), or "SA" (South America)

optional_parameters.name: lang
optional_parameters.description: Localize the results to this language, if available. Default: "en".

optional_parameters.name: show
optional_parameters.description: Content to be listed in the response. Possible values are: "webcams", "categories", "continents", "countries", "regions", "properties". Default is "webcams".

api_list.api_description: This is a modifier. Returns a list of the webcams in the bounding box given by north-east ({ne_lat},{ne_lng}) and south-west ({sw_lat},{sw_lng}) coordinates. Required: {ne_lat},{ne_lng},{sw_lat},{sw_lng}.

required_parameters.name: ne_lat
required_parameters.description: North-east WGS84 latitude of the bounding box.

required_parameters.name: sw_lng
required_parameters.description: South-west WGS84 longitude of the bounding box.

required_parameters.name: sw_lat
required_parameters.description: South-west WGS84 latitude of the bounding box.

required_parameters.name: ne_lng
required_parameters.description: North-east WGS84 longitude of the bounding box.

optional_parameters.name: lang
optional_parameters.description: Localize the results to this language, if available. Default: "en".

optional_parameters.name: show
optional_parameters.description: Content to be listed in the response. Possible values are: "webcams", "categories", "continents", "countries", "regions", "properties". Default is "webcams".

api_list.api_description: This is a modifier. Returns the list of webcams ordered by {order}. The optional sorting direction is given by {sort}. Required {order}.

required_parameters.name: sort
required_parameters.description: Possible values are: "asc" (ascending), or "desc" (descending).

required_parameters.name: order
required_parameters.description: Possible values are: "popularity" (default order: "desc"), "hotness" (default order: "desc"), "new" (default order: "desc"), "recent" (default order: "desc"), "random" (default order: "asc"), or "distance" (default order: "asc", only available if the modifier "nearby" has been applied).

optional_parameters.name: lang
optional_parameters.description: Localize the results to this language, if available. Default: "en".

optional_parameters.name: show
optional_parameters.description: Content to be listed in the response. Possible values are: "webcams", "categories", "continents", "countries", "regions", "properties". Default is "webcams".

api_list.api_description: A get request is used to retrieve a specific object from the TripIt API given its TripIt object ID. Since get requests do not change data they are all made via an HTTP GET request for a URL that takes the following form:

required_parameters.name: object_type
required_parameters.description: is one of the following strings:  air activity car cruise directions lodging map note points_program profile rail restaurant transport trip weather

required_parameters.name: tripit_object_id
required_parameters.description: is the object ID of the TripIt object being requested.

api_list.api_description: A list request is used to retrieve multiple objects given an object type and set of filter parameters. Since list requests do not change data they are all made via an HTTP GET request for a URL that takes the following form:

required_parameters.name: object_type
required_parameters.description: is one of the following strings:  trip object points_program

required_parameters.name: filter_parameter
required_parameters.description: Valid values for <filter parameter> and <filter value> depend on the <object type>.  See  http://tripit.github.io/api/doc/v1/index.html#resource_section for a table of valid combinations.

required_parameters.name: filter_value
required_parameters.description: Valid values for <filter parameter> and <filter value> depend on the <object type>.  See  http://tripit.github.io/api/doc/v1/index.html#resource_section for a table of valid combinations.

api_list.api_description: A delete request is used to delete existing objects

required_parameters.name: object_type
required_parameters.description: is one of the following strings:  air activity car cruise directions lodging map note rail restaurant segment transport trip

required_parameters.name: tripit_object_id
required_parameters.description: is the object ID of the TripIt object being requested.

Wavebase Global Ocean Tiles API:

Wave Signficant Height (GET): https://api.wavebase.app/v1/tiles/singleband/{variable}/{date-timeslot - YYYYMMDDHH}/0/0/0.png

e.g.: https://api.wavebase.app/v1/tiles/singleband/VHM0/2023051703/0/0/0.png 

Currently only Tile at 0/0/0 is available Free.  Contact:  info@wavebase.app for additional tiles.

This endpoint provides weather forecast information based on the user's location. It returns the current weather conditions, daily forecasts, and additional weather data, such as temperature, humidity, and wind speed. The data is sourced from OpenWeatherMap, ensuring accurate and reliable information.

required_parameters.name: location
required_parameters.description: The name of the city or location for which to retrieve the weather forecast.

optional_parameters.name: days
optional_parameters.description: The number of days of forecast data to retrieve (1-16). If not provided, it defaults to 1 day.

api_list.api_description: aaa

api_list.api_description: This is prototype endpoint for using Giphy as a translation engine for a GIF dialect. Use a plus or url encode for phrases.

required_parameters.name: s
required_parameters.description: term or phrase to translate into a GIF

optional_parameters.name: rating
optional_parameters.description: limit results to those rated (y,g, pg, pg-13 or r).

api_list.api_description: Get all offers available for a product.

required_parameters.name: product_id
required_parameters.description: Product id of the product for which to fetch offers.

optional_parameters.name: country
optional_parameters.description:
Country code of the region/country to return offers for.
Valid values: see https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ISO_3166-1_alpha-2
Default: `us`.

optional_parameters.name: language
optional_parameters.description:
The language of the results.
Valid values: see https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/List_of_ISO_639-1_codes
Default: `en`.

api_list.api_description: Get all product reviews. Infinite pagination/scrolling is supported using the *limit* and *offset* parameters.

required_parameters.name: product_id
required_parameters.description: Product id of the product for which to fetch reviews.

optional_parameters.name: country
optional_parameters.description:
Country code of the region/country.
Valid values: see https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ISO_3166-1_alpha-2
Default: `us`.

optional_parameters.name: language
optional_parameters.description:
The language of the results.
Valid values: see https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/List_of_ISO_639-1_codes
Default: `en`.

optional_parameters.name: offset
optional_parameters.description:
Number of reviews to skip.
Valid values: integers from 0-30000
Default: `0`.

optional_parameters.name: rating
optional_parameters.description:
Only return reviews with user rating greater than the specified value.
Valid values: 1-5.

optional_parameters.name: limit
optional_parameters.description:
Maximum number of product reviews to return.
Valid values: integers from 0-100.
Default: `10`.

api_list.api_description: Search for product offers - both free-form queries and GTIN/EAN are supported. Each page contains up to 30 product offers. Infinite pagination/scrolling is supported using the *page* parameter.

required_parameters.name: q
required_parameters.description: Free-form search query or a GTIN/EAN (e.g. *0194252014233*).

optional_parameters.name: store_id
optional_parameters.description:
Only return product offers from a specific store. Store IDs can be obtained from the Google Shopping URL after using the **Seller** filter by taking the first part of the `merchagg` variable (until the first *|*) within the `tbs` parameter.

**Example**
after filtering for eBay, the following URL is shown on the address bar: `https://www.google.com/search?gl=us&tbm=shop&q=shoes&tbs=mr:1,merchagg:g6296794|m6296724|m133929137`, in that case, the extracted eBay Store ID is  **g6296794**.

optional_parameters.name: sort_by
optional_parameters.description:
Sort product offers by best match, top rated, lowest or highest price.
Possible values: `BEST_MATCH`, `TOP_RATED`, `LOWEST_PRICE`, `HIGHEST_PRICE`.
Default: `BEST_MATCH`.

optional_parameters.name: max_shipping_days
optional_parameters.description: Only return product offers that offer shipping/delivery of up to specific number of days (i.e. shipping speed).

optional_parameters.name: page
optional_parameters.description:
Results page to return.
Default: `1`.

optional_parameters.name: on_sale
optional_parameters.description:
Only return product offers that are currently on sale.
Default: `false`.

optional_parameters.name: product_condition
optional_parameters.description:
Only return products with a specific condition.
Possible values: `NEW`, `USED`, `REFURBISHED`.

optional_parameters.name: free_shipping
optional_parameters.description:
Only return product offers that offer free shipping/delivery.
Default: `false`.

optional_parameters.name: language
optional_parameters.description:
The language of the results.
Valid values: see https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/List_of_ISO_639-1_codes
Default: `en`.

optional_parameters.name: country
optional_parameters.description:
Country code of the region/country to return offers for.
Valid values: see https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ISO_3166-1_alpha-2
Default: `us`.

optional_parameters.name: free_returns
optional_parameters.description:
Only return product offers that offer free returns.
Default: `false`.

optional_parameters.name: max_price
optional_parameters.description: Only return product offers with price lower than a certain value.

optional_parameters.name: min_price
optional_parameters.description: Only return product offers with price greater than a certain value.

The /data endpoint is a part of the Ecommerce Product API that allows you to retrieve information about a specific product in your ecommerce store. By making a GET request to this endpoint and specifying the product name, you can access a wide range of information about the product, including its name, description, images, and more. The response to the request will be in JSON format and will include all relevant product data. This endpoint is an essential tool for retrieving information about products in your store, and is designed to be fast and efficient, ensuring that you receive the information you need quickly and easily.

    "url": "https://store.steampowered.com/app/1593500/"
}`

api_list.api_description:
Get closest block to a timestamp

Runs binary search over a blockchain's blocks to get the closest one to a timestamp.

Every time this is run we add new data to our database, so each query permanently speeds up future queries.

required_parameters.name: chain
required_parameters.description: Chain which you want to get the block from

required_parameters.name: timestamp
required_parameters.description: UNIX timestamp of the block you are searching for

```
{
"datetimeUpdated":1661544000005
```

Provides detailed information for a given company:
- Symbol
- Company Name
- Industry
- Website
- Relevant Tags
- General Sector
- Country
- Zip Code

Provides access to daily historical company pricing data over a given period of months

A sample output for each day:
`{
"changePercent":0
"close":115.1465
"date":"2022-05-27"
"high":115.187
"low":112.628
"open":113.55
"symbol":"AMZN"
"updated":1654726813000
"volume":93660160
}`

api_list.api_name: Query divesites by gps boundaries (For use with maps)
api_list.api_description: The API endpoint that queries dive sites by GPS boundaries allows developers to search for dive sites within a specified geographical region, defined by a set of latitude and longitude coordinates. This endpoint can be particularly useful for creating interactive maps or applications that require displaying dive sites within a specific area. To use it add the four map bounds as query params

api_list.api_name: Query Divesites by a country or a region.
api_list.api_description: The endpoint returns a json list of dive sites which match the region or country entered as the query. The range of results depend but there is usually around 100-500 sites for each country. There are around 15'000 dive sites listed in the database.

query: I am planning a vacation with my family and we are interested in scuba diving. Can you recommend some dive sites in Thailand? Additionally, we would like to know the top-tier stays available in that area for accommodation options.
relevant APIs: Query Divesites by a country or a region.

api_list.api_description: This endpoint verifies the validity of an email address. It checks the email address format, domain, and whether it is a disposable email address. It then extracts the MX records from the domain's DNS records and connects to the email server via SMTP. The function also simulates sending a message to the email server to confirm that the mailbox associated with the email address actually exists.
get normalized form of an email

required_parameters.name: email
required_parameters.description: email id
